briefdescription.para: initialization parameters for a Light xyL Server model instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to Lightness server instance.
Light xyL server callbacks.

memberdef.name: BT_MESH_MODEL_LIGHT_XYL_SRV
memberdef.initializer: BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_XYL_SRV, \ _bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv_op, &(_srv)->pub, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA( \ struct bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv, _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv_cb), \ BT_MESH_MODEL_CB(BT_MESH_MODEL_ID_LIGHT_XYL_SETUP_SRV, \ _bt_mesh_light_xyl_setup_srv_op, NULL, \ BT_MESH_MODEL_USER_DATA( \ struct bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv, _srv), \ &_bt_mesh_light_xyl_setup_srv_cb)

briefdescription.para: Light XYL Server model composition data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Light xyL Server model instance.

detaileddescription.para: Asynchronously publishes a xyL status message with the configured publish parameters.

simplesect.para: This API is only used publishing unprompted status messages. Response messages for get and set messages are handled internally.

parameterdescription.para: Server instance to publish on.
Message context to send with, or NULL to send with the default publish parameters.
Current status.
Successfully sent the message.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.

briefdescription.para: Publish the current xyL target status.

detaileddescription.para: Asynchronously publishes a xyL target status message with the configured publish parameters.

simplesect.para: This API is only used publishing unprompted status messages. Response messages for get and set messages are handled internally.

parameterdescription.para: Server instance to publish on.
Message context to send with, or NULL to send with the default publish parameters.
Current status.
Successfully sent the message.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv *srv, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, enum bt_mesh_model_status status_code)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_light_xyl_srv_range_pub

briefdescription.para: Publish the current xyL Range status.

detaileddescription.para: Asynchronously publishes a xyL Range status message with the configured publish parameters.

simplesect.para: This API is only used publishing unprompted status messages. Response messages for get and set messages are handled internally.

parameterdescription.para: Server instance to publish on.
Message context to send with, or NULL to send with the default publish parameters.
The status code of the response.
Successfully sent the message.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
